instructions: Pull down the notification shade twice and then tap the gear icon in the bottom left corner of the shade. In the resulting window, tap Network & Internet . In the resulting window, tap Advanced to reveal the Private DNS entry. Tap Private DNS , select Private DNS provide hostname and type either the CloudFlare URL or one of the CleanBrowing URLs in the provided space. Tap Save to finish.

Pull down the notification shade twice, tap the gear icon at the top right corner, and then tap Wi-Fi. Long press the name of the wireless network to be modified and then tap Modify network . Tap Advanced options and then tap DHCP . From the popup, tap Static and then tap DNS 1 . Type the DNS address (such as 8.8.8.8). Tap SAVE to finish.
